# Lighthouse Performance Alert - 2026-01-23

## Summary

The following metrics have dropped below the 95% threshold:

| Page | Metric | Score |
|------|--------|-------|
| Home | Performance | 72% |
| /about | Performance | 90% |
| /services | Performance | 94% |
| /portfolio | Performance | 94% |
| /portfolio | Accessibility | 93% |
| /contact | Accessibility | 94% |
| /contact | Best Practices | 79% |

## Required Actions

1. Investigate the cause of the score drop
2. Implement necessary fixes
3. Verify improvements locally using Lighthouse
4. Update this PR with findings and fixes
